"About this Quest":
"If you are wearing specific costumes or layered wear, such as swimwear or a Summer Rappy Suit, you can receive the effect of the \"Costume Bonus\" PSE.
\"Costume Bonus\" increases your rare drop rate and the amount of EXP you earn.
For details on which costumes this PSE applies to, please check bumped.org.
